comments: Archeria Hook.f, Fl. Tasmania, 1: 263 (1857) is named after this author. Born Launceston, Tasmania. Died Fairfield near Longford, Tasmania.  Worked at Kew 1856-1858.
examples: Pherosphaera W. Archer in Hooker's J. Bot. Kew Gard. Misc., 2: 52 (1850).
source: Missouri Bryological list updates 8 November 1990. Barnhart, Biographical Notes Upon Botanists (1965). J.H. Maiden, Records of Tasmanian Botanists: 3-4 (1909).
